metadata.Title: CVE-2018-6044 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: ** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: CVE-2018-16064. Reason: This candidate is a reservation duplicate of CVE-2018-16064. Notes: All CVE users should reference CVE-2018-16064 instead of this candidate. All references and descriptions in this candidate have been removed to prevent accidental usage.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
oxide-qt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
